summary: A header file defining AppArmor audit message types and functions for log record processing. It establishes constants for different categories of AppArmor events (grants, denials, errors, etc.) and declares utility functions for log record formatting.

logs.reason: Initializes AppArmor log record structures before they're populated with event data
logs.resolution: No resolution needed - this is part of the normal logging infrastructure

logs.reason: Converts hexadecimal values to human-readable strings for inclusion in log messages
logs.resolution: No resolution needed - this is a utility function for log formatting

logs.reason: Converts IP protocol numbers to their corresponding named protocols for clarity in log entries
logs.resolution: No resolution needed - this is a utility function for log formatting
